pros: I can not think of any pros to such a deplorable institution
cons: Unprofessional, narcissistic leadership, no basic respect for employees, no regard for equity, diversity, and a severely sexist environment

review_title: Exciting science, beautiful nature, if you're ok with a small European town
pros: Top-notch intitute in Quantum Science. Very collaborative atmosphere in ion trapping group. Best facilities I've seen among 4 world-class institutes and universities. Fantastic location.
cons: Administrative Staff and OEAW red tape will not necessarily underastand the priorities of top-notch academic research. Will be at slight disadvantage if not fluent in German (but most people are completely tolerant and cooperative).

review_title: Learn a lot from the professors there
pros: all people are very professional and help me a lot
cons: the population of the city is too small
